section.title: What this manual covers
section.para: This manual describes the available counters in the RM5 IdM application. The counters enable runtime monitoring of the application state.

section.title: Counter table column descriptions
section.para: Counters are listed alphabetically in a table below. For each counter, following information is presented:

listitem.para: The name of counter. The name is used to identify the columns in the counter result file.
The value the the counter reports. This can be, for example average time in milliseconds or number of events that occured per second.
The type of the counter. There are several counter types available in the system. The type defines what kind of value the counter reports.

Public attribute defines if the counter is meant for public use for administrators. If the counter is not public, it is meant for only internal use for RM5 developers to help trouble shooting. The description of internal counter is not necessary accurate and might refer to some internal data structures of which the administrators don't have to care about.
The description of what the counter measures.

row.entry: Displays the number of delay elements in the delay queue.
Displays the number of events in the event queue.
Displays the number of session entres in the session cache. This value should always be below the configured maximum cache size.
Displays the number of get roles method calls per second made to Authrorization service. Normally most of these calls should get the results from the session cache.
Displays the average time it takes for Authorization service to get session role data from database.
Displays the maximum time it took to get the session data from database during the monitoring interval.

Displays the average rate of database queries the Authorization service does per second. Each query means the Authorization service got the roles from database instead of the cache. This should normally be a lot smaller than the Auth.getRolesRate counter value.
Displys the average rate of JMS messages the Authorization service receives per second.
Displays the average number of roles per session.
Displays total number of processed log records during historical data processing.
Displays number of historical log records processed per second.
Displays the average and maximum time for the generation of audit and on-demand reports.
Displays the average time the synchronization between EDB and FDB took.
Displays the max time the synchronization between EDB and FDB took.
Displays the average time the synchronization between FDB and LDAP took.
Displays the max time the synchronization between FDB and LDAP took.
Displays the average number of failed RADIUS requests per second.
Displays the average number of RADIUS requests per second that queried an account that doesn't exist (invalid username).
Displays the average number of rejected RADIUS responses per second.
Displays the average time it took to process RADIUS request.
Displays the max time it took to process RADIUS request.
Displays the average number of RADIUS requests per second. This includes both succesfull and failed requests.
Displays the average number of failed login attempts per second made trough RM5 login module.
Displays the average number of successful login attempts per second made trough RM5 login module.
Displays the average time it took to execute searches. The time is measured from CMP EntityBean search -methods.
Displays the maximum time it took to execute searches. The time is measured from CMP EntityBean search -methods.
Displays the average time it took to resolve allowed actions.
Displays the max time it took to resolve allowed actions.
Displays the average rate of resolving allowed actions.
Displays the average time it took to resolve allowed searches.
Displays the max time it took to resolve allowed searches.
Displays the average rate of resolving allowed actions.
Displays the average rate of method security checks.
Displays the average execution time for method haeHenkilonTiedot in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the maximum execution time for method haeHenkilonTiedot in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the average rate of calls per second to method haeHenkilonTiedot in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the average execution time for both haeKayttajanTehtavaroolit methods in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the maximum execution time for both haeKayttajanTehtavaroolit methods in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the average rate of calls per second to both haeKayttajanTehtavaroolit methods in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the average execution time for method paivitaKayttajatunnuksenViimeisinKayttopvm in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the maximum execution time for method paivitaKayttajatunnuksenViimeisinKayttopvm in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the average rate of calls per second to method paivitaKayttajatunnuksenViimeisinKayttopvm in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the average execution time for method haeKayttajaryhmanTiedot in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the maximum execution time for method haeKayttajaryhmanTiedot in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the average rate of calls per second to method haeKayttajaryhmanTiedot in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the average execution time for method haeKayttajaryhmanValtuudet in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the maximum execution time for method haeKayttajaryhmanValtuudet in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the average rate of calls per second to method haeKayttajaryhmanValtuudet in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the average execution time for method haeTehtavaroolinHoitosuhteet in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the maximum execution time for method haeTehtavaroolinHoitosuhteet in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the average rate of calls per second to method haeTehtavaroolinHoitosuhteet in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the average execution time for method haeTehtavaroolinJaKayttajaryhmanValtuudet in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the maximum execution time for method haeTehtavaroolinJaKayttajaryhmanValtuudet in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the average rate of calls per second to method haeTehtavaroolinJaKayttajaryhmanValtuudet in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the average execution time for method haeTehtavaroolinKaikkiValtuudet in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the maximum execution time for method haeTehtavaroolinKaikkiValtuudet in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the average rate of calls per second to method haeTehtavaroolinKaikkiValtuudet in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the average execution time for method haeTehtavaroolinTiedot in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the maximum execution time for method haeTehtavaroolinTiedot in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the average rate of calls per second to method haeTehtavaroolinTiedot in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the average execution time for method haeTehtavaroolinValtuudet in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the maximum execution time for method haeTehtavaroolinValtuudet in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the average rate of calls per second to method haeTehtavaroolinValtuudet in SiteMinderHelperFacade.
Displays the average execution time for method changeUserPassword in SmPwdDataHelperFacade.
Displays the maximum execution time for method changeUserPassword in SmPwdDataHelperFacade.
Displays the average rate of calls per second to method changeUserPassword in SmPwdDataHelperFacade.
Displays the average execution time for method resetFailedLogins in SmPwdDataHelperFacade.
Displays the maximum execution time for method resetFailedLogins in SmPwdDataHelperFacade.
Displays the average rate of calls per second to method resetFailedLogins in SmPwdDataHelperFacade.
Displays the average execution time for method setPasswordChangeDate in SmPwdDataHelperFacade.
Displays the maximum execution time for method setPasswordChangeDate in SmPwdDataHelperFacade.
Displays the average rate of calls per second to method setPasswordChangeDate in SmPwdDataHelperFacade.

Displays the currently used memory reported by the JVM. The value is in megabytes. Note: This used, free and allocated memory model is simplified version of the actual Java virtual machine memory model. JVM memory model is really much more complicated and these values should treated as hints of the actual memory usage.

Displays the currently free memory reported by the JVM. The value is in megabytes. The free memory also contains the memory that is not allocated yet but should be available to the JVM. The amount of allocated memory is controlled by the JVM startup parameters. Note: This used, free and allocated memory model is simplified version of the actual Java virtual machine memory model. JVM memory model is really much more complicated and these values should treated as hints of the actual memory usage.

Displays the currently allocated memory reported by the JVM. The value is in megabytes. The amount of allocated memory is controlled by the JVM startup parameters. Note: This used, free and allocated memory model is simplified version of the actual Java virtual machine memory model. JVM memory model is really much more complicated and these values should treated as hints of the actual memory usage.
The average time it took to process a request made to RM5 UI.
The maximum time it took to process a request made to RM5 UI.
The average rate of requests made to RM5 UI.
